Name: google maps traffic layer
Description: Raster of the real-time traffic congestion

Name: Operational Points (Stops) INFRABEL
Description: The operational points of the railway network in Belgium

Name: Line sections INFRABEL
Description: Segmentation of the rail network based on infrastructure characteristics

Name: Segments Infrabel
Description: The segments of the SNCB network in Belgium

Name: Vehicle Speed
Description: The average speed of STIB/MIVB vehicles in 20-second intervals

Name: Vehicle Aggregated Speed
Description: The average speed of STIB/MIVB vehicles in 10-minute intervals

Name: Segments
Description: The segments of the STIB/MIVB network

Name: Vehicle Distance
Description: The distance of each STIB vehicle since the last stop

Name: Vehicle Position Lime
Description: The positions of Lime vehicles in Brussels

Name: Vehicle Position Pony
Description: The positions of Pony vehicles in Brussels

Name: Vehicle Position Dott
Description: The positions of Dott vehicles in Brussels

Name: Vehicle Position Bolt
Description: The positions of Bolt vehicles in Brussels

Name: Weather
Description: Weather and air quality data for Brussels (from OpenWeather & Irceline)
